Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, here in this thread I am going to be modelling the craft from Mars Direct after wards, i'll be taking requests for craft that people want me to make, preferably realistic rockets. Any progress wil be posted here.

If you don't know what Mars Direct is, Here are some links:

Wikipedia

The Mars Underground (On Youtube)

UPDATE: June 2nd

-Note: Mars Direct Postponed until i get good references. I'm now doing the SLS in its current concept .

-Finished SLS Core tank and engine models. (Used Sketchup)

Edited June 2, 2013 by I.R.L.
Would you like to join STDC? (Check my signature.)

I'm trying to texture right now, so does anyone know how to get the unwrap to fit in the UV box in blender? or can i unwrap it somewhere else?

Also to POKTC; Probably, but how will it work?? like do we all work on one mod or do we just have a single thread to display them on?

Edited June 3, 2013 by I.R.L.

No, there are several mods that people work on in groups. From what you did on the SLS engine base, you seem quite good at Sketchup, so it would be very good if you could become the fifth member...

PS: What is your experience with Unity?
I have no experience with unity. Are we still able to make our own mods?

Sure, why not. Also I can texture if you can give me a UV Unwrap.

Also for anyone else seeing this am finally texturing the fuel tank.
